DOC.brief_summary: To collect the efficacy and safety information in subjects who have been treated with Zyvox (linezolid) for vancomycin resistance Enterococcus faecium infection for their appropriate use in daily practice.
DOC.brief_title: Zyvox (Linezolid) Special Investigation For Vancomycin-Resistant Enterococci (VRE)
DOC.criteria: Subject to whom Zyvox (linezolid) was administered. Infected subject with Vancomycin resistance Enterococcus faecium. Infected subject with MRSA and other organism.
